Vaccine name: Comirnaty (also known as tozinameran or BNT162b2)
Storage: Freezer storage only at –13°F to 5°F (–25°C to –15°C)
Emergency use in: ['Argentina', 'Australia', 'Canada', 'Chile', 'Colombia', 'Costa Rica', 'Ecuador', 'European Union', 'Hong Kong', 'Iceland', 'Iraq', 'Israel', 'Japan', 'Jordan', 'Kuwait', 'Lebanon', 'Malaysia', 'Mexico', 'Moldova', 'Mongolia', 'Norway', 'Oman', 'Panama', 'Peru', 'Philippines', 'Qatar', 'Serbia', 'Singapore', 'Tunisia', 'United Arab Emirates', 'United Kingdom', 'United States']

Storage: Freezer storage. Developing an alternative formulation that can be refrigerated.
Emergency use in: ['Algeria', 'Argentina', 'Armenia', 'Bahrain', 'Belarus', 'Bolivia', 'Bosnian Serb Republic', 'Egypt', 'Honduras', 'Gabon', 'Ghana', 'Guatemala', 'Guinea', 'Guyana', 'Hungary', 'Iran', 'Kazakhstan', 'Kyrgyzstan', 'Lebanon', 'Mexico', 'Moldova', 'Mongolia', 'Montenegro', 'Myanmar', 'Nicaragua', 'Pakistan', 'Palestinian Authority', 'Paraguay', 'San Marino', 'St. Vincent and the Grenadines', 'Serbia', 'Syria', 'Tunisia', 'Turkmenistan', 'United Arab Emirates', 'Uzbekistan', 'Venezuela']

Vaccine name: AZD1222 (also known as Covishield in India)
Storage: Stable in refrigerator for at least 6 months
Emergency use in: ['Algeria', 'Argentina', 'Australia', 'Bangladesh', 'Bhutan', 'Brazil', 'Canada', 'Chile', 'Colombia', 'Dominican Republic', 'Egypt', 'El Salvador', 'European Union', 'Iceland', 'India', 'Iraq', 'Kuwait', 'Maldives', 'Mexico', 'Moldova', 'Mongolia', 'Morocco', 'Nepal', 'Nigeria', 'Norway', 'Pakistan', 'Philippines', 'Saudi Arabia', 'Seychelles', 'Sri Lanka', 'South Africa', 'South Korea', 'Thailand', 'United Kingdom', 'Vietnam']

Efficacy: 72% in United States, 64% in South Africa, 61% in Latin America
Storage: Up to two years frozen at –4° F (–20° C), and up to three months refrigerated at 36–46° F (2–8° C).
Stable in refrigerator for up to two years

Vaccine name: Covaxin (also known as BBV152 A, B, C)
Storage: At least a week at room temperature
